insa.h4401.controller.states

Class ComputingRouteState

  • java.lang.Object
    • insa.h4401.controller.states.DefaultState
      • insa.h4401.controller.states.ComputingRouteState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IState

    public class ComputingRouteState
extends DefaultState
    This class represents the logic state in which the application is computing the best route to reach all delivery points.
    Author:
    Lisa, Estelle, Antoine, Pierre, Hugues, Guillaume, Paul
